snippet.title: PC Longplay [220] Postal 2: Apocalypse Weekend
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by:  Aero

Apocalypse Weekend is an expansion pack to Postal 2 released by Running with Scissors on May 12, 2005 for Microsoft Windows, and September 28, 2005 for the Mac OS X and Linux versions. Apocalypse Weekend expands the reaches of Paradise with new maps and missions, set on Saturday and Sunday, adds new weapons and foes, and raises the gore and violence to an even greater level.

Unfortunately, this game has no super-fun pigeon hunter mission, because Vince Desi didn't think of the kids. :(

Saturday:

0:00:42 Hospital
0:25:39 Lower Paradise
0:30:00 Restaurant
0:35:02 Cow Meadow
0:43:08 Super-Fun Pigeon Hunter Mission (cancelled due to budgetary issues)
0:44:20 Lower Paradise
0:49:38 Publisher Office Complex

Sunday:

0:59:12 Vince's House
1:05:11 Elephant Preserve
1:12:30 Terrorist Training Camp
1:36:47 Military Base
2:07:36 Lower Paradise
2:14:27 Publisher Office Complex
2:21:50 Dog Pound
2:30:23 The Bridge
2:35:41 Mad Cow Zombie Mike J 
2:40:28 End / Credits / Ranking -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
